channel.title: Trying it out
channel.description: Ok so Ive never played minecraft before and then I heard alot fo talk about it. I saw some videos on moparscape forums and thought hey doesn't look too bad. Then I saw mopar has its own minecraft server. So I thought "what would be a better place to play it at then a familiar community". Anyways if anyone has any tips or things theyd like to share to a brand new player who knows NOTHING about minecraft, lemme know.

item.title: Trying it out
item.dc:creator: @Seductress Seductress
item.description:
@Seductress wrote:

Also, make friends! Don’t be douche and raid people straight away. It’ll be much more fun if you’re nice. Then you can make enemies later ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Trying it out
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

There is no need to play single player before joining a server. My first minecraft experience was online, and I don’t even like playing single player.

OP: You’ll just have to check the minecraft wiki and familiarize yourself with it, it makes the game that much easier to play.

Read full topic

item.title: Trying it out
item.dc:creator: @Acrodox Acrodox
item.description:
@Acrodox wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:4, topic:402940”][quote author=Acrodox link=topic=500001.msg3656805#msg3656805 date=1310080975]

Play single player BEFORE you go online

also read the wiki for crafting recipes… so you dont bug people on how to build stuff

Thanks! Stupid ass question, how do i connect
[/quote]I’m assuming you have the client working etc, so just click Multiplayer and enter minecraft.moparisthebest.com.[/quote]

Thanks

Read full topic
